description: Meet Anthony.This almost 20 year old loves the feeling of working his muscles. From playing rugby to power lifting to sex, you can tell Anthony has put many hours into his body once you see him shirtless.As of right now, Anthony is single. Recently out of a 2 year relationship, he's not wasting any time, having already enjoyed two girls at once the other weekend.Before he gets attached to another lady, we had to get him in front of the camera for all of you to see. So here he is, Anthony, enjoying himself on the couch, in the bathroom and jerking himself to completion on to the kitchen chair. Enjoy.
title: Anthony
